sys_script_include.description: This script used to cal from service catalog client script to get user data from Alert HSC
sys_script_include.name: CatalogScripttoCallAlert

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_ce2e14b31b2f6510234b0f6e6e4bcb25
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_aleen_alertsnowp.CatalogScripttoCallAlert</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>This script used to cal from service catalog client script to get user data from Alert HSC</description><name>CatalogScripttoCallAlert</name><script><![CDATA[var CatalogScripttoCallAlert = Class.create();
CatalogScripttoCallAlert.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getUserDetails: function() {
        gs.addInfoMessage('script include triggered');
        var userId = this.getParameter('userId');
        obj = {};
        var grSysUser = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_user');
        if (grSysUser.get(userId)) {
            obj.mobile_phone = grSysUser.getValue('mobile_phone');
            obj.email = grSysUser.getValue('email');
        }
        gs.addInfoMessage(obj + JSON.stringify(obj));
        return JSON.stringify(obj);
    },
    type: 'CatalogScripttoCallAlert'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-27 05:41:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ce2e14b31b2f6510234b0f6e6e4bcb25</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CatalogScripttoCallAlert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Workplace Access and Security" source="x_aleen_alertsnowp">87fbe6c21b7e41108dcc755e034bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Workplace Access and Security">87fbe6c21b7e41108dcc755e034bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ce2e14b31b2f6510234b0f6e6e4bcb25</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-27 05:43:55</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
